'''1.16.5''' is a minor hotfix update to {{el|je}} released on January 15, 2021,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-16-5|Minecraft Java 1.16.5 Released|January 15, 2021}}</ref> which fixes issues relating to server crashes. Servers running this version are compatible with [[Java Edition 1.16.4|1.16.4]] clients. This is the first version released in 2021.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.16.5 Release Candidate 1|otherissuescount=2
|;From 1.16.3
|203337|<code>java.lang.IllegalStateException</code>: POI data mismatch: already registered.
}}
'''Other'''
*Fixed two major stability issues.
